name: 😊
greetingText: Each time a woman stands up for herself she stands up for all women.
wishText: To the women who fearlessly pursue their dreams, overcome challenges, and inspire others.😉
textInChatBox: Happy Woman's Day !! Yeee! Stay Strong ...
